formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression: ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Issue_Type__c} ,"Client is unresponsive to the integrations team" ) && ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Issue_Type__c} ) && {!myVariable_current.SI_Partner_Account__c} != 'VnV' && !CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Project_Name__c}, 'Quess')

value.stringValue: IF( [Project__c].SI_Partner_Account__c != 'VnV' && !CONTAINS([Project__c].Project_Name__c, 'Quess') && (OR((ISNEW() && ISPICKVAL([Project__c].Project_Stage__c ,"Awaiting Kick-off") && (!ISBLANK([Project__c].LOE_Received_Date__c )) ),(AND(ISPICKVAL([Project__c].Project_Stage__c ,"Awaiting Kick-off") , ((ISCHANGED([Project__c].Project_Stage__c)) || (ISCHANGED([Project__c].LOE_Received_Date__c ))),(ISPICKVAL([Project__c].Status__c ,"At Risk") || ISPICKVAL([Project__c].Status__c ,"Active"))))) ), true, false)

formulas.name: formula_myRule_3_pmetrule
formulas.expression: IF( {!myVariable_old.SI_Partner_Account__c} != 'VnV' && !CONTAINS({!myVariable_old.Project_Name__c}, 'Quess') && (OR((ISNEW() && ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.Project_Stage__c} ,"Awaiting Kick-off") && (!ISBLANK({!myVariable_old.LOE_Received_Date__c} )) ),(AND(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.Project_Stage__c} ,"Awaiting Kick-off") , ((ISCHANGED({!myVariable_old.Project_Stage__c})) || (ISCHANGED({!myVariable_old.LOE_Received_Date__c} ))),(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.Status__c} ,"At Risk") || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.Status__c} ,"Active"))))) ), true, false)
